pages.text: All spells, $(warning) require access to herbs. The Component Pouch is the most basic way to provide this.$(br2)$(info) As spells generally consume less than a single item, the pouch breaks the herb down and stores the remainder within its very fabric.

pages.title: Component Pouch
pages.text: The right compartment carries herbs, while the left can hold any item of your choice.$(br2)$(info) A summary of what remains of the herbs used to cast a spell is displayed in the bottom left of the screen, after casting.
